summary: This Mod Add 1 new Spell that can kill a Giant using this spell 2 times :) !!
descriptionHtml:
Endorse if you like :)

                  This Mod Add 1 new spell to the game called : \'\'Chain Of Spikes Lightning\'\' 
                          The book is located in Dragonreach ( Whiterun) in Farengar room 

                   -This spell can kill a bandit or a Thalmor guy by using the spell 1 time
           -This Spell can kill a giant by using it 2 times and for the mammoth 4 times or 3 times
                                  - And can kill a....DRAGON by using it 4 times ( 2 times if you have the \'\'frost spell do 50 % more damage\'\' Perk)!!
                    -When you use this spell the Destruction Skill incrase faster !
(These are just exemples of what the spell can do ;) )
 
-------------------------------------------
Comming soon :

- I will reduce the cost of the spell.( Done ) 
-------------------------------------------


Have Fun ! :D
author: Spect99

files.name: Chain Of Spikes Lightning Cost Reduced to 100
